Question: RTVA Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RTVA Inc

CES 2024

- RTVA Inc will be showcasing their latest 8K OLED TV with HDR technology at CES 2024
- The TV features a 120Hz refresh rate for smooth motion and a wide color gamut for vibrant, lifelike images
- It also includes built-in Dolby Atmos speakers for immersive sound and supports various smart TV functionalities such as voice control and streaming services
- The TV is equipped with multiple HDMI and USB ports for connectivity and comes with a sleek, slim design
- RTVA Inc aims to deliver a premium viewing experience with their cutting-edge 8K OLED TV at CES 2024
